articles.title: UK sold off US$42b of semicon firms before review - The Star Online
articles.description: LONDON: The U.K. was once the leading semiconductor innovator in Europe, producing the likes of Arm Ltd., whose technology is found in 90% of all mobile devices, and Imagination Technologies Group Ltd., which supplies chip designs used by Apple Inc.

articles.title: Clash of the titans EURO 2020 final: England vs. Italy - TSN
articles.description: Sunday’s European Championship final between traditional powerhouses Italy and England at Wembley Stadium has all the makings of a classic as both the Azzurri and the Three Lions will look to end lengthy championship droughts.
articles.content: It all comes down to this. After 50 matches of Euro 2020, only one remains and its the biggest of all. At Wembley Stadium on Sunday, Italy looks to win its first Euro since 1968 and will have to do s… [+4655 chars]

articles.title: Soccer-England's Foden misses training ahead of Euro final v Italy - The Star Online
articles.description: (Reuters) -     England midfielder Phil Foden did not take part in Saturday's team training session ahead of their European Championship final against Italy as a precaution due to a minor injury.
